description:
Utility function to be used in higher-level print
methods, such as those for summary.lm,
summary.glm and anova.  The
goal is to provide a flexible interface with smart defaults such
that often, only x needs to be specified.
example_call: printCoefmat(x, digits = max(3L, getOption("digits") - 2L), signif.stars = getOption("show.signif.stars"),
